TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于对安全对象进行编码的 XML 对象模型。

span.span: Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于简单的 XML 对象模型，以便在安全系统中使用，不要使用作为常规的 XML 对象模型的轻量实现。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model. 本文档假定基本知识的 XML。This documentation assumes a basic knowledge of XML. 元素的简单 XML 对象模型由以下部分组成：The simple XML object model for an element consists of the following parts: - 标记是元素名称。The tag is the element name. - 属性是零个或多个名称/值特性对元素上。The attributes are zero or more name/value attribute pairs on the element. - 子级都将零个或多个元素嵌套在``和``。The children are zero or more elements nested within `` and ``. 强烈建议基于属性的 XML 表示形式用于表示安全元素和它们的值。It is strongly suggested that attribute based XML representation is used to express security elements and their values. 这意味着将元素的属性表示为属性和属性值表示为属性值。This means properties of an element are expressed as attributes and property values are expressed as attribute values. 避免在标记中的嵌套文本。Avoid nesting text within tags. 对于任何`text`的类型表示形式的表示形式``通常可用。For any `text` representation a representation of type `` is usually available. 使用此基于属性的 XML 表示形式提高了可读性，使生成的 XML 序列化的简单 WMI 可移植性。Using this attribute-based XML representation increases readability and allows easy WMI portability of the resulting XML serialization. 属性名称必须是一个字符或更长时间，但不能为`null`。An attribute name must be one character or longer, and cannot be `null`. 如果使用基于元素的值表示形式，元素的文本字符串，它`null`中表示``窗体; 否则，将文本分隔通过``和``令牌。If element-based value representation is used, elements with a text string that is `null` are represented in the `` form; otherwise, text is delimited by the `` and `` tokens. 可以与属性，显示组合这两种形式如果存在。Both forms can be combined with attributes, which are shown if present. 标记、 属性和文本的元素，如果存在，始终是区分大小写。The tags, attributes, and text of elements, if present, are always case-sensitive. XML 格式包含引号和转义在必要时。The XML form contains quotations and escapes where necessary. 在 XML 中包括用于无效的字符的字符串值导致。String values that include characters invalid for use in XML result in an . 这些规则适用于所有属性和方法。These rules apply to all properties and methods. > [!NOTE] > 出于性能原因，在元素被编码为 XML 文本形式，而不是在每个属性或方法集后仅检查字符的有效性。For performance reasons, character validity is only checked when the element is encoded into XML text form, and not on every set of a property or method. 静态方法都允许显式检查在需要时。Static methods allow explicit checking where needed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了利用的成员类。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CPP/SecurityElementMembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CS/securityelementmembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

The value of the attribute.

summary.span: 将名称/值特性添加到 XML 元素。

span.span: Adds a name/value attribute to an XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和特性中的值应仅包含有效的 XML 属性字符。Names and values in attributes should only contain valid XML attribute characters. XML 属性名称必须是唯一的。XML attribute names must be unique. 使用从字符串中删除无效字符。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. 没有带引号的字符串，支持以便为名称/值对的字符串应包含引号或其他需要用引号括起来的字符。There is no support for quoted strings, so strings for name/value pairs should not contain quotes or other characters requiring quoting. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法将名称/值特性添加到一个 XML 元素。The following code shows the use of the method to add a name/value attribute to an XML element. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个属性存储在作为名称/值对。Each attribute is stored in the as a name/value pair. 名称和特性中的值应包含仅的有效 XML 属性字符。Names and values in attributes should contain only valid XML attribute characters. 使用从字符串中删除无效字符。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. 没有带引号的字符串，支持以便为名称/值对的字符串应包含引号或其他需要用引号括起来的字符。There is no support for quoted strings, so strings for name/value pairs should not contain quotes or other characters requiring quoting. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性来获取 XML 元素的属性。The following code shows the use of the property to get an attribute of an XML element. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Public Shared Function Escape (str As String) As String

param.name: str
param.span: 要对其中的无效字符进行转义的字符串。

span.span: The string within which to escape invalid characters.

summary.span: 将字符串中的无效 XML 字符替换为与其等效的有效 XML 字符。

span.span: Replaces invalid XML characters in a string with their valid XML equivalent.

returns.span: 包含无效字符的输入字符串被替换。

span.span: The input string with invalid characters replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法之前使用中的字符串替换字符串中的无效字符。Use this method to replace invalid characters in a string before using the string in a . 如果在使用了无效的字符未经过转义引发。If invalid characters are used in a without being escaped, an is thrown. 下表显示无效的 XML 字符和其转义的等效类型。The following table shows the invalid XML characters and their escaped equivalents. | 无效的 XML 字符Invalid XML character | 替换为Replaced with | |-----------------------|---------------| | `<` | `<` | | `>` | `>` | | `"` | `"` | | `'` | `'` | | `&` | `&` | ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法将无效的 XML 字符串中字符与等效的有效 XML。The following code shows the use of the method to replace invalid XML characters in a string with their valid XML equivalent. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CPP/SecurityElementMembers.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CS/securityelementmembers.cs#19)] [!code-vb[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

summary.span: 从 XML 编码的字符串创建安全元素。

span.span: Creates a security element from an XML-encoded string.
A created from the XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的 XML 字符串; 不使用单引号请改用转义的双引号引起来。Do not use single quotation marks in the XML string; instead, use escaped double quotation marks. 而不是，如"`Microsoft"`使用"`Microsoft"`。For example, instead of "`Microsoft"` use "`Microsoft"`. 在任一会引发异常，或在某些情况下，单引号被视为字符串中的文本，会产生使用单引号。Using single quotation marks can result in either an exception being thrown or, in some cases, the single quotation marks being treated as text in the string.

exception.span: 包含一个或多个单引号字符。

span.span: contains one or more single quotation mark characters.
is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 XML，如下所示，`SearchForChildByTag("second")`将返回的子元素``。With XML as follows, `SearchForChildByTag("second")` would return the child element ``. ``` text1 text2 ``` ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法能够根据其标记名称找到子级。The following code shows the use of the method to find a child by its tag name. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XML 中，标记将出现在脚本按如下所示：In XML, the tag appears in the script as appears below: ``` text ``` 如果此元素包含子元素，则子元素将替换`text`。If this element has child elements, the children will replace `text`. 将仅有效的 XML 标记字符串分配给此属性。Assign only valid XML tag strings to this property. 使用从字符串中删除无效字符。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性来获取 XML 元素的标记名称。The following code shows the use of the property to get the tag name of an XML element. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
